summary: The sprint review meeting covered the progress on Sprint SP-001 for BrightHR Lite2 MVP, detailing the implementation of Employee Directory (US-006) and Leave Management (US-008), including built features, screens, and testing instructions. The PM requested the client to test the app and provide feedback on usability and alignment with requirements.

actions.task: Run ./test-generated-app.command, test the flows (add/view employees, submit/approve leave requests, check responsiveness), and share feedback on usability, bugs, missing features, and whether it solves spreadsheet pain points
